text: Visio Conferencing: Major UX/UI improvements across all platforms, including Join/Leave/Rejoin calls experiences and seamless Return to calls while using the app.
Parallel Calls: Ability to run multiple calls simultaneously using ONE single account on different devices.
View-Only Sharing with Watermarks: Major feature preventing screenshots or picture-taking on highly confidential PDFs.
External Link: UX/UI improvements & ability to create sub-folders.
Passkey: emails notifications when a Passkey is added & deleted.
